::Nightlight/windlord::

"Where will we go??" asked Nighlight "it's raining ouside and the 
childrens will get cold..."

"We can't stay here a second more " replied windlord whjile he took 
some supplies "don't worry all will be ok..."





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Now we must leave before nut case comes back with help.  Take 
anything 
> we can use.  Perplex you know what's here better than anyone.  
Windlord will 
> start bringing supplies.  I'll bring Trinity and Zeni first along 
with 
> Nightlight to guard them.  Come on outside once you have the first 
batch of 
> supplies, I need Windlord to lead me there."
